Literature.Title: Systematic approach to optimizing specifically targeted antimicrobial peptides against Streptococcus mutans
Literature.Author: He J, Yarbrough DK, Kreth J, Anderson MH, Shi W, Eckert R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptococcus mutans UA159(MIC=8µg/ml),Streptococcus sanguinis NY101(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAK(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli W3110(MIC=8µg/ml)
